item.title: EP 164 - My Haunted Apartment
item.itunes:title: My Haunted Apartment
item.description:
A woman who refused to bow to her cruel mother's wished go missing, and then we take a journey into my very own haunted apartment!

Blanche Monnier was a beautiful young woman who wanted to follow her heart. But her evil mother would take drastic steps to prevent that!

And then we visit my haunted apartment. Am I haunted by ghosts, are the supposed hauntings just coincidences tied together? We'll try to get to the bottom of it today on Dead Rabbit Radio!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Blanche Monnier
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blanche_Monnier

Blanche Monnier Was Kept Hidden In Her Room For 25 Years, Just For Falling In Love
https://allthatsinteresting.com/blanche-monnier

Blanche Monnier was imprisoned in a tiny room for 25 years because her mother hated her choice of husband
https://www.thevintagenews.com/2018/01/05/blanche-monnier/

Asmodexia Official Trailer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FS5ky-ZRCFo

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
